thread.section_title: Travelrepublic Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Travelrepublic | www.travelrepublic.ie
thread.title: Yvonne O'Neill Magbuhos
thread.title_full: Travelrepublic reviewed by Yvonne O'Neill Magbuhos

author: Yvonne O'Neill Magbuhos
title: Yvonne O'Neill Magbuhos
text: I booked a hotel last year but the location was too far from where we needed to be in London. i called and was told I could change the booking for free with the company if I booked another hotel any date any location, which is what i did. found prices good. I have also booked my summer holiday for august 2017, when I realised the balance of flights had to be due practically christmas week rang up and again very helpful and extended the time, I looked up the hotel I booked reviews on tripadvisor not great so got in touch again and in minutes had the hotel changed. will use Travelrepublic again
